input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Boston Scally"
Reference Product Name: "Boston Scally Hoodie"
Reference Product Description:
There is nothing more that every Bostonian needs than a quality hooded sweatshirt… or as we like to refer to them as… a “hoodie.”

Look, when we put on a “hoodie” we want a soft & comfortable sweatshirt that gives us enough mobility to raise our arm and hail down the bartender for another beer or go nuts when the Pats score.

This sweatshirt provides just that—it's SUPER soft. This is the sweatshirt you have to hold back from wearing to bed every night.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Champion Men's Notre Dame Fighting Irish Team Arch Reverse Weave Pullover Hoodie'
  - Name='Champion Men's Logo Graphic Pullover Hoodie'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Logo Sleeve Graphic Hoodie'
  - Name='Champion Jackets & Coats Champion Coca-Cola Hoodie S'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Midweight Hooded Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Champion Men's Arena Reverse Weave Hoodie with Roses Script Logo'
  - Name='Champion Men's Script Hoodie'
  - Name='Champion Life Mens Reverse Weave Shift Pullover Hoodie'
  - Name='Supreme Men's Cross Box Logo Cotton Hoodie'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Shirts Carhartt Blue Hoodie'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Hooded Shamrock Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Champion Men's Northwestern Wildcats Football Hoodie'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Built Graphic Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Supreme Small Box Hooded Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Midweight Hooded Zip-Front Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Supreme Men's Motion Logo Hooded Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Felt Logo Graphic Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Supreme x Swarovski Box Logo Cotton Hoodie'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Flame Resistant Force Fit Midweight Logo Graphic Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Supreme Box Logo Hoodie'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Rain Defender Loose Fit Midweight Thermal-Lined Full-Zip Sweatshirt'
  - Name='Men's Supreme S Logo drawstring hoodie'
  - Name='Supreme Bling Box Logo Cotton Hoodie'
  - Name='Carhartt Men's Force Relaxed Fit Midweight Long-Sleeve Logo Graphic Hooded T-Shirt'
  - Name='Supreme Men's Logo-Appliquéd Hoodie'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Champion Men's Notre Dame Fighting Irish Team Arch Reverse Weave Pullover Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pullover hoodie with similar construction, silhouette, and intended casual use. The team branding is not significant to core features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Champion Men's Logo Graphic Pullover Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic pullover hoodie with brand logo, matching the reference product's key features and casual/cosy positioning.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Logo Sleeve Graphic Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Midweight loose fit pullover hoodie. Construction, material, and purpose are all closely aligned with the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Champion Jackets & Coats Champion Coca-Cola Hoodie S
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pullover hoodie silhouette and construction, only distinction is the collaboration branding, which doesn't affect core product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Hooded Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard midweight hooded sweatshirt matches perfectly with the reference; same product type, construction, and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Champion Men's Arena Reverse Weave Hoodie with Roses Script Logo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pullover hoodie with signature Champion construction; only minor feature differences in logo decoration.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Champion Men's Script Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic pullover hoodie, same silhouette and intended use, only minor branding difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Champion Life Mens Reverse Weave Shift Pullover Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pullover hoodie with Champion's signature reverse weave, directly matching the product type and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Supreme Men's Cross Box Logo Cotton Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton pullover hoodie, main difference is prominent branding, otherwise same silhouette and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Shirts Carhartt Blue Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Named as 'hoodie', from a brand specializing in classic sweats; fully matches description and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Hooded Shamrock Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Loose fit, midweight, hooded sweatshirt—the construction and intended use are essentially identical to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Champion Men's Northwestern Wildcats Football Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard pullover hoodie with sports logo; function and construction align but with added college branding.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Built Graphic Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Loose fit, midweight sweatshirt, but 'hood' is not explicitly in the name; may or may not be hooded.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Supreme Small Box Hooded Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Explicitly a hooded sweatshirt; same silhouette, materials, and casual function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Midweight Hooded Zip-Front Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic hooded sweatshirt, only difference is being zip-front vs pullover, very similar otherwise.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Supreme Men's Motion Logo Hooded Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hooded sweatshirt with standard features; branding aside, matches construction and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Felt Logo Graphic Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Loose fit, midweight sweatshirt, not clear if hooded; possible that it's not a hoodie.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Supreme x Swarovski Box Logo Cotton Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton pullover hoodie; different collaboration branding but core construction and intended customer closely match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Flame Resistant Force Fit Midweight Logo Graphic Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Midweight sweatshirt, but flame resistant and may not be hooded; function and target customer drift slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Supreme Box Logo Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A hoodie by name and construction; matches the reference product very closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Rain Defender Loose Fit Midweight Thermal-Lined Full-Zip Sweatshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hooded sweatshirt with added weatherproof thermal lining and full-zip; similar, but with more specialized features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Supreme S Logo drawstring hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Drawstring hoodie—standard silhouette and construction that aligns closely with the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Supreme Bling Box Logo Cotton Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton hoodie; main difference is ornamental branding, closely matches in all meaningful product aspects.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Carhartt Men's Force Relaxed Fit Midweight Long-Sleeve Logo Graphic Hooded T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hooded, but labeled a t-shirt with lighter construction, differing from the sweatshirt construction of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Supreme Men's Logo-Appliquéd Hoodie
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hoodie with logo; standard silhouette, features and construction all directly align with the reference.
